Boost your Kijiji Ads with K+ Reposter, saving you time and money by bumping your listings to the top. Effortlessly repost ads and drive more sales with ease!

Additionally, K+ Reposter offers an automated repost feature, allowing seamless background reposts.

Maximize your views and increase sales.

Note: Please be mindful of Kijiji's posting limits, including daily and category maximums, which we are unable to modify.
